    http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/Common/v4

    ValueWithAttributes ParagraphListItem

      • http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/Common/v4:ParagraphListItem

    • Example XML

      <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes"?>

<ParagraphListItem language="en" listItem="1234" text2="Formatted text example." textFormat="PlainText" xmlns="http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/Common/v4"/>

      Example JSON

      {
  "ParagraphListItem" : {
    "value" : null,
    "listItem" : 1234,
    "text2" : "Formatted text example.",
    "language" : "en",
    "textFormat" : "PlainText"
  }
}

      • Attribute Summary

        Attributes 
        Name Description
        listItem
        The item or sequence number.
        Details
        Type http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema:integer
        Example Value 1234
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 1
        text2
        Provides text and indicates whether it is formatted or not.
        Details
        Type Text
        Example Value Formatted text example.
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 1
